TopicTitle: Is anyone else having a problem with this too...?

Articles.Content:
> ![KSPthing.png](http://i1168.photobucket.com/albums/r496/shadowbast001/KSPthing.png)

This seems like I\'m just stupid and don\'t know how to rotate this thing, but I\'m relatively new to the game, so please go easy on me.

I am having a troublesome time trying to place ailerons , rudders, landing gear, etc. onto the wings. Is this not supposed to happen, or can I rotate it to be flush with the wing somehow?

Thanks for your time.

Use QWEASD.

It\'s strange now that its not automatic, but it does make way for... something.
Or you can just use the \'set to angles\' button beside the symmetry button. Very useful for landing gear and such that can\'t be placed the right way.
